Package entities

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
entities.Character
entities.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterI, java.lang.Comparable<Enemy>
public class Enemy
extends Character
implements java.lang.Comparable<Enemy>
Represents an enemy character within the game that extends the Character class. The Enemy class includes additional properties for tracking the current position of the enemy and implements the Comparable interface to compare enemies based on their fire power.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Enemy​(java.lang.String name, int fire_power, Room position)
    Constructs a new Enemy with the specified name, fire power, and current position.

    Retrieves the current position of the enemy.

    Updates the current position of the enemy.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of the enemy, including the name and fire power.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Enemy other)
      Compares this enemy to another enemy based on their fire power.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Enemy>
      Parameters:
      other - the other enemy to compare with
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this enemy's fire power is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified enemy's fire power
